DOC.brief_summary: To determine effect investigational product serum LDL cholesterol .
DOC.criteria: healthy mildly moderate hypercholesterolemic ( serum total cholesterol 5.28.5 mmol/l ) adult sign write informed consent participation clinical study within 30 day prior screen visit throughout study severe obesity consumption lipid/cholesterol lower medication 1 month prior screen visit throughout study consumption plant stanol plant sterol contain food product Benecol Becel pro active 1 month prior visit 2
